website_summaries.verdict: A toy vacuum that's geared to toddlers' imaginations with sounds and features, but it's hard to push and not ideal for older children.
pros: Toddlers will be fascinated by this "popping" vacuum that picks up the included blocks
Lights up and plays songs and educational sound effects with the touch of buttons
cons: Handle doesn't stay upright, and is somewhat short

customer_reviews.title: What a terrible toy!
customer_reviews.text: This product is the worst! We never review anything but wanted to save others the trouble with this one. Our jolly 15 month old vacuum lover was a puddle of tears after playing with this toy. The handle doesn't stay locked in position so it's extremely difficult to maneuver and he found it so painfully frustrating it was actually difficult to watch. Steer clear.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew and Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: More interesting to an 18 mo old than the Dyson
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old nephew got this vacuum and the Dyson Children’s vacuum at Christmas and the colors, actual cubes he could pick up and sounds on this vacuum got his attention. The other one actually sucks up paper, but he didn’t seem to care about it. Many people commented on kids struggling to push this one and hold it upright but my nephew had no issues. It does seem to be difficult to stand up on its own after a kid is done playing becsuse they aren’t careful about standing it up, so it ends up laying down a lot when not used. I highly recommend for young kids becsuse he couldn’t get enough of it.
customer_reviews.author: BaBaBenny

customer_reviews.title: Hard to push
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is hard for children between 1-2 years of age to push. It only works well on non-carpet surfaces. My granddaughter (19 months) loves to see me push around this toy, but she is not interested in pushing it herself. She only likes to push the buttons to hear the sound effects when plays with it alone. I'm hoping as she gets older it will become easier for her to push.
customer_reviews.author: SweetTea*

customer_reviews.title: It's not bad but wouldn't buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our 18-month old son for Christmas and it isn't bad. He loves pretending to clean so we thought this would be perfect (he has a broom that he carries around all the time). The thing I noticed right away was the hinge between the blue and the white portion of the vacuum is really awkward as it doesn't and he'll often get jammed up when the vacuum bends at the hinge as it doesn't come low enough he he often keeps pushing with the vacuum tipping over and him falling with it. He likes all the other aspects of the vacuum but never walks around with it which I assume is because of the awkward hinge.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Pop pop pop vacuum toy was perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves to vacuum so I looked at so many different toy options for her. I decided on this version based on brand name, it makes noise (aunties fun for parents). And it was just her size! My niece loves it and when my sister vacuums she vacuums and I have heard she likes to push it after the doggie too! He doesn't run from her like he does the big vacuum! Perfect birthday gift! Pop pop pop is a wonderful gift from Auntie! Made very well for many years of use!
customer_reviews.author: T. Connors

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Good size for my 15 month old. She loves using it to vacuum the carpet alongside her Dad, which is adorable!! The ability to pick up blocks is a cool feature, but on the hard wood floors, it makes loud popping like noises when being moved, which may not be too annoying if it weren’t being played with for an extensive amount of time. I do not like how there is no option to lock it in an upright position. It pretty much can flop over and bash baby in the face at any time.
customer_reviews.author: JulZee

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my son for his 1st birthday. ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for his 1st birthday. He was not interested in this at first, but now is almost 2 and loves this and he "helps" me vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Kobe

customer_reviews.title: 18month old Christmas gift awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this. We already lost the balls but I replaced them with other balls. The vacuum is perfect for him and sings and lights up. Dad was vacuuming this morning and guess who brought a long his little vacuum my son! I really like this because I can always take it with me because its really not that big. However this vacuum doesn't stand upright so when putting it away it falls over. The picture is a little misleading I figured it would click upright like real vacuums. Another good thing it turns off. :) Happy Mom.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: While pushing the buttons to make the music, vacuum noises and other sounds is fun for my little granddaughter, I was disappointed that it doesn't stand on its own, it's very hard to pick up the balls unless it's pushed fast, and it doesn't push on carpet or a rug at all...only the wood floor. She's only 16 months, so maybe when she's older it will be a toy to return to. But not now.
customer_reviews.author: M. E.

customer_reviews.title: 3 star...doesn’t stand on its own.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t stand on it’s own. The moment you stop touching it, it falls. If you have hardwood or tile flooring this could damage the toy with time. It’s a fun toy but wish the company would fix that major flaw. Normally I would only take one star off for a flaw, but with this it’s a major two star deduction. Please fix this and we’re all good.
customer_reviews.author: Ash M.

customer_reviews.title: Not a hit.
customer_reviews.text: I was SO excited to give this to my son for his 1st birthday. He loves vacuums. He just didn't go crazy for it like I thought he would. The handle doesn't stay up and it's kind of hard to scoop up the blocks. Once in a while he takes it out but for the most part it just sits around.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: What i dislike about the product is the lack of support when ...
customer_reviews.text: What i dislike about the product is the lack of support when the child holds the handle to push it it topples over and it hit her feet. It also is clumsy to use because of this topple over due to lack of support when handle is held to push and the child was 20 months old when she received this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Keith-Ann

customer_reviews.title: Hard to push
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to push on carpet. It also does not stay up-right. I also don't like the fact the balls can be removed. visually, it's very cute. But functionally, it does not work well for my 2.5 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Roe

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves this. He was scared of the vacuum and it helped him get use to it. The button are great he loves the sounds. Very interacting.
customer_reviews.author: PATVAU

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves this thing, plays with it all the time, and now since he has his own vacuum he doesn't try to take mine while I'm cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Odd Handle.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my 18 month old. It works great but the Vaccume hand bends odly. When you move it like a vaccine would the handle bends even lower. It’s a cute toy just got a weird handle.
customer_reviews.author: Charity

customer_reviews.title: This product needs an improvement
customer_reviews.text: I thought the vacuum was higher cause my 2 yr older can’t keep the vacuum on the floor it keeps tipping over & forget picking up the color plastic pieces.
customer_reviews.author: dmp

customer_reviews.title: Great for a 1 1/2 almost 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves vacuums. He absolutely loved this gift for Christmas. Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: Cute toy, great learning, cute singing that’s not annoying. Love that you can actually suck up the blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Because my granddaughter could walk, didn't mean she could ...
customer_reviews.text: Because my granddaughter could walk, didn't mean she could push this. I thought it would be hooked together as one piece to push. The top half comes down and it is hard for her to push until she gets older. She likes to play with it on the ground, but can't use it as it is supposed to be used.
customer_reviews.author: speterson49

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift
customer_reviews.text: Our almost 3 year-old daughter loved this Christmas present, and is having great fun running around the house picking everything up. It seems durable, and has a couple of modes for play/learning.
customer_reviews.author: HappyGurl

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My one year old grandson loves it and so does his two year old brother
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Gregory

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old loves this toy! It is really fun
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: awesome toy for an interested cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my daughter when she was 15mo. She loves when I vacuum and equally loves that she can now vacuum with me. It isn't too loud for a noisy toy. The blocks are difficult to sweep up when on carpet, but works well when on tile or hardwood. my daughter is now 19mo and still loves playing with this toy daily
customer_reviews.author: Amber G

customer_reviews.title: Drives her mom crazy with the sounds but it's really adorable.
customer_reviews.text: 1yr old granddaughter loves this toy. Drives her mom crazy with the sounds but it's really adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Lorien Blakely

customer_reviews.title: Great toy vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it. Heavy duty and he loves to help me clean my carpet. You wont be sorry if you buy this vacuum
customer_reviews.author: R Toth

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't roll properly in even thin carpet
customer_reviews.text: Bummed! We have pretty thin carpet and this vacuum can't roll properly dur to the lip that catches the blocks into the vacuum. My 1 year old gets stuck and frustrated. I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My 1 year old loved this and still plays with it almost a year later!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Hard to push
customer_reviews.text: This toy is very hard for toddler to push on carpet. It gets stuck and my child just picks it up instead of rolling it on the ground
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: it if stood upright it would be a great toy, but unfortunately that design flaw is too ...
customer_reviews.text: cute toy but it topples over every time my toddler opens the front hood to remove the little balls, which upsets her. she gets frustrated and stops playing with it. it if stood upright it would be a great toy, but unfortunately that design flaw is too significant to keep it. other products will be just as fun and less frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisanne Timpe DuPuis

customer_reviews.title: So much fun! He has a little trouble vacuuming up the ...
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! He has a little trouble vacuuming up the blocks, but he loves to walk it around and make it play the songs. :)
customer_reviews.author: Neifer

customer_reviews.title: Well made & received
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift and the birthday boy loved it! Good sturdy construction that should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy Anyway
customer_reviews.text: It sounds like the batteries are dead or dying when I turn the volume all the way up but my son loves it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Quenisha Stephens

customer_reviews.title: The little one (only a year old) hasn't gotten the ...
customer_reviews.text: The little one (only a year old) hasn't gotten the hang of it yet, but it makes noise so she drags it around.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Chastain

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: I got this because my son has been walking around trying to use my vacuum, little did I know that this doesn't even stand by itself. If I didn't already have it out of the box, I'd return it.
customer_reviews.author: O. R. Wannett

customer_reviews.title: has potential, but no.
customer_reviews.text: It has the potential to be great and fun, but the main problem is my son (18 months) can't even move it on the carpet therefore he never plays with it. He received a different vacuum that's great and actually moves on the carpet. He plays with it all the time, but pays no mind to this one. Also the bottom moves which annoys him also because everytime he moves it, it moves. Overall he doesn't like it and get annoyed with it.
customer_reviews.author: slewanick

customer_reviews.title: VTech home run Like always
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves it just like the big vacuum and he can push it around and pick up the 3 little blocks that comes with it, only bad thing I can say about it is the sound good be a little better it plays music and a brief vacuum sound. But at least he isn't playing with the real one anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Dale A. Joiner

customer_reviews.title: great toy, except
customer_reviews.text: I only gave this vacuum 4 stars because I received this yesterday and I wasn't aware that the handle of the vacuum doesn't stay straight. It falls, so if you're child is not walking very well yet he will have a hard time holding on to the handle because the vacuum doesn't stay straight up, it kind of folds in half. I wish I would have known that before purchasing. Other than that the vacuum is great, the sounds and everything are well put.
customer_reviews.author: MMMom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My great grandson loves it. Plays with it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Fanning

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is very akward to push, especially on carpet. For me! My 17 month old gave up completely and just carries it around by the handle. The top part (with buttons) seems too short in length, and then connects to the TOP of bulky base (with the popping blocks) instead of to the back of it. This makes it hard to push the base. Also, u have to lean the vacuum against something when not in play because even though it stands up on its own, the slightest bump to the the top of the vacuum causes the whole thing to tip backward.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for a 1+ year old
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my neice, who is 1, and the toy has lots of nice features. Lights up, sings songs, picks up balls and helps her to balance as she's learning to walk.
customer_reviews.author: JCEDGE

customer_reviews.title: NOT A TRUE VACUUM, NOT WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: bought this product for my grandson, he loves to help me vacuum, but the handle keeps folding down so you can't use it correctly. very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: I love that it has an on/off
customer_reviews.text: My son has a hard time getting the balls to pop up into the vacuum, but he still loves the toy. I love that it has an on/off switch
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah C

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and it is a great price. I have a 16 month old daughter who plays with it often. The only thing I don't like about it is it is hard for her to push it forward because of how small the front wheels (not visible in picture) are underneath it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Dahle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The noise makes me nuts but the little one loves vacuuming up the little balls.
customer_reviews.author: C. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Cute concept. Epic fail.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a cute idea but one of the worst toys I've purchased. It's supposed to pick up the balls as if a real vacuum however, any toddler coordinated enough to do so may just be a genius. I'd send it back but it's not worth my time.
customer_reviews.author: jennybro

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't push nicely like a vacuum should
customer_reviews.text: My son enjoys this toy but it's a little awkward to use. It doesn't push nicely like a vacuum should. He drags it around the house and has fun with it regardless. It is also difficult to suck up the little blocks, that is when you can find them :-)
customer_reviews.author: Noelle A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: No Sound after 2 weeks :(
customer_reviews.text: My son loves to help me clean and I thought this would be perfect to help him feel included. When we received the vacuum it was the cutest thing. After only 2 weeks the sound went out on it. Thinking it was due to "demo" batteries I changed them out, still nothing. Now I know most parents pray for such a toy of silence but it has now become a pointless push toy that he notices is quiet different without the "realistic" vacuum noises. Other than that the toy would be very cute.
customer_reviews.author: A.Davis

customer_reviews.title: It's a Hit!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute toy and my 18 month old grandson loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Bananie59

customer_reviews.title: I liked this because it is a vacuum and a pop ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked this because it is a vacuum and a pop up toy. It is a little hard to push when it it is flat on the floor. My granddaughter does like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: Great for age one to three
customer_reviews.text: Great for age one to three. It is pretty cool that it picks up the balls. Will get again for young child gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter LOVES THIS THING!!! Well worth the money. Fast Delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Cherita37

customer_reviews.title: Great vauum!
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old son loved this for Christmas... He loves the little blocks, pushing it and all the sounds it makes. The only con is that it doesn't actually pick up dog hair and dirt! Ha!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D'Angelo

customer_reviews.title: ... a Christmas present for my 16-month-old nephew and he loved it! The toy is still going strong
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my 16-month-old nephew and he loved it! The toy is still going strong, even 4 months later.
customer_reviews.author: Mel K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter's favorite toy, she is one and a half and gleefully motors around the house with this. Came quickly, as advertized. A toy that will bring joy.
customer_reviews.author: Art Lange

customer_reviews.title: daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves this toy, the only thing is as a new mom I didn't realize this one is for kids who already walk, not to encourage walking.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Davies

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 20 month old twin grandbabies and they absolutely loved it!
customer_reviews.author: ceomom3

customer_reviews.title: It is age appropriate and so much better than the "corn poppers" of old which were really ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it. I gave it to him for his 1st birthday. It is age appropriate and so much better than the "corn poppers" of old which were really great too. Improvement on an already winner!!
customer_reviews.author: Laney Ray

customer_reviews.title: Vtech Vacuum for Kids is Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum for one granddaughter, and the older one fell in love with it,too,so Grandma had to buy one more!!! I like the fact that it teaches them how to count, colors, plus the noise makes it seem like they are really vacuuming, too. It is a good toy for children.
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very Educational
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is 14 months and he loves pushing this and filling the compartment on it with different objects! It's easy to push and he likes all the sounds it makes. It's very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: amazonuser

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Every toddler should have one of these. My 15 month old son loves this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: kelley martin

customer_reviews.title: I love this toy vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy vacuum!! and so does my 1 year old son! it works great on hardware floors but not carpet. It plays music and Abc's!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's had plenty of rough treatment but is quite sturdy and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it! It's had plenty of rough treatment but is quite sturdy and worth the money. Definitely recommend this for a boisterous 1 year old
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this toy for my 1y/o niece, she loves it

customer_reviews.title: My daughter didn't really like this toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter didn't really like this toy. Her younger sister hasn't gravitated towards it either... Not sure... seems too short and not life-like enough for a play vacuum. Would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this at Christmas for my 1.5 year old. Him and his 3 year old brother loved it. It works great still today and my two boys are hard on things. They still push it around and havent lost interest yet.
customer_reviews.author: Krystle

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and he plays with it all of the time!

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my son to be 1 year ...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait for Christmas to see how my granddaughters react

customer_reviews.title: Loves!
customer_reviews.text: He loves it and it's such a cool idea to be able to vacuum something up such as blocks.

customer_reviews.title: Great Item for kids!
customer_reviews.text: I love this item! It is a lot of fun, but it does not have any purpose other than entertainment. I would recommend this for guardians!
customer_reviews.author: Fresh

customer_reviews.title: The two front wheels are very small and do not roll easily. My son still loves playing with it he ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work well on carpet. The two front wheels are very small and do not roll easily. My son still loves playing with it he has learned to tilt it just enough to not use the front wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hess

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun toy which my son loves. The cubes that are vacuumed up are different colors so they help with color recognition.
customer_reviews.author: Libba S. Feierstein

customer_reviews.title: My twins love this toy!
customer_reviews.text: My twins received this vacuum when they were 10 months old. It took them a few months but they figured it out and love it. The only problem was that they always fought over it so I actually bought a second one. They are 19 months old and still play with them all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Clavette

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute and good. But it doesn't stand up very well and doesn't work on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: steph Boubou

customer_reviews.title: two great toys
customer_reviews.text: This toy combines a vacuum concept with the classic push popper, my son loves it and when we have guests over, I even catch a few adults giving it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Thiesen

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute toy. It makes some realistic vacuum sounds, but there's a lot of little songs and noises that my brother enjoys that it makes.
customer_reviews.author: uphoria

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan!
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't do much. It barely picks up the plastic cubes it comes with and takes a lot of skill to actually pick them up. Way too complicated for a toddler.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 14 month old grand son. It was ok but a little difficult to maneuver.

customer_reviews.text: my baby love's this toy! now he can help clean up around the house lol

customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my granddaughter. She loves it. When we are vacuuming she does also and loves to vacuum the balls

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 month old loves this! . She understood it and knew how to play with it.

customer_reviews.title: VTech pop and Count
customer_reviews.text: Shopping for this item online was so much easier than trying to find in a store. It will be the ideal gift.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Such a great toy. My grandson "vacuums" my house all day.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love all the V tech toys!!!! My grandson enjoys them all!!! They are fun & educational!

customer_reviews.title: its ok i guess
customer_reviews.text: its not a bad toy but not a great one as well.it does not work well on our carpet with the balls..its great on hard word floors.but my son enjoyed it so that's all that matters to me
customer_reviews.author: Leonor White

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice toy delivered at the door. No need to stand in long lines!
customer_reviews.author: Onsi J. Mousa

customer_reviews.title: Can't stand alone
customer_reviews.text: Vac handle falls down too readily. Would like to see an easier upright balance allowing for the vacuum to be parked/stored in the upright position without having to prop it up. Two year old enjoys pushing it and mastered pick up of the colored blocks readily. Would like to see a yellow block as well.
customer_reviews.author: Larney James

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy, doesn't roll on carpet though
customer_reviews.text: It's great on our tile kitchen floor, my one-year-old absolutely loves it. However, as soon as she tries to go onto the carpet she gets stuck. I taped the handle into a permanent upright position, so maybe that will help. But it doesn't roll on carpet because there aren't front wheels. The sounds and music are fun though.
customer_reviews.author: kmc0427

customer_reviews.title: Cute little vacuum that actually sucks up the small plastic balls that come with it
customer_reviews.text: Cute little vacuum that actually sucks up the small plastic balls that come with it. The only down side is its top heavy so the toy will not stand on its own. My child is just learning to walk so she can not control the weight of the toy. It lays flat on the floor when she plays with it. But eventually once the walking is stable she may be able to use it as its supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: thanks vtech
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been messing with vacumes alot so i got her this one and she loves it she wants to clean up more thanks again vtech i look fwd ti buying the vtech kids tree house toy.
customer_reviews.author: Demisha taylor

customer_reviews.title: A hit
customer_reviews.text: My grandson opened it for Christmas and hasn't stopped playing with it. He's 2yrs old. Great item for a little one who likes to push things around
customer_reviews.author: Paula Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Niece loved this toy vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: My husband's niece enjoys this toy so much. She imitates her parents by vacuuming as well. Too cute. Def recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Roque

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's sounds real but is hard to push for 12 mo old
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not something I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: The Positive: The music is cute and it lights up. We lay it down on the floor and play with it. the Negative: It is just about impossible to push this vacuum. For me or my grandson. It isn't balanced well and falls backwards. It's really useless as something you can push. But my grandson does pull it behind him.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific toy for young toddler!
customer_reviews.text: It was a perfect for a not quite two year old. Helps him to learn colors, numbers, besides helping to build the child's self-esteem, by "helping mommy".
customer_reviews.author: mary Sharkey

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this item more than the little cleaning cart. Even my grandson had to try it out. lol

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is 17 months old and her vacuum is just the right size for her and it is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Mora

product_meta.title: VTech Pop and Count Vacuum
product_meta.description:
Your child will want to help clean around the house With the pop & count Vacuum from VTech! As your baby pushes this adorable Vacuum cleaner across the floor, It picks up the colored blocks for interactive learning fun.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Three number buttons and a light-up puppy character entertain and educate. The pretend-play vacuum really picks up blocks. Your baby can clean up and count their way to learning fun with the Pop and Count Vacuum by VTech. This little vacuum easily glides across the floor to pick up its colored blocks that have been left about. As each block is picked up, the vacuum responds with fun sounds as the blocks bounce around inside. Three buttons on the toy reinforce counting and number skills as your child plays.

 ENGAGING FEATURES 
This learning toy features three number buttons and a light-up puppy character button that reinforce learning. Use the mode selector to choose between learning and music mode. In learning mode, babies can press the number buttons to learn numbers and to hear a question about picking up blocks. In music mode, the number buttons play fun melodies. Young ones will enjoy pressing the puppy button to hear fun sounds and songs in learning mode and more melodies in music mode. Automatic shut off and volume control make the Pop and Count Vacuum parent friendly.

 CLEAN AND COUNT FUN 
Your child will want to help clean around the house with this vacuum toy. As your baby pushes this adorable educational toy vacuum cleaner across the floor, it picks up the colored blocks for interactive learning fun. As each block is picked up, the vacuum responds with fun sounds as the blocks bounce around inside. After vacuuming the blocks, you can open the blocks container cover to remove the blocks and hear funny sounds and short tunes.

 ABOUT VTECH 
Ever notice the look on your baby’s face when they learn something new through their own discovery? These self-accomplished moments are a parent’s greatest reward. To help fulfill them, VTech created the Infant Learning series of toys. These unique interactive learning toys directly respond to what children do naturally – play! Using innovative technology, these toys react to baby’s interactions, making each play experience fun and unique as they learn age-appropriate concepts like first words, numbers, shapes, colors, and music. More importantly, VTech’s Infant Learning toys develop baby’s mental and physical abilities by inspiring, engaging, and teaching.
feature_bullets: Pretend-play vacuum really picks up blocks
Blocks pop in container as child pushes vacuum along
Vacuum for kids is for 1 to 3 year old; operates on 2 AA batteries that are included
